summary: Defines Django ORM models that represent articles, publications, and tags with many-to-many relationships, and includes an extensive test suite that validates all aspects of those relationships such as adding, removing, assigning, clearing, bulk operations, prefetching, forward and reverse lookups, queryset assignments, model inheritance, and deprecation handling.
business_intent: Provide a reliable reference implementation and regression test suite for many-to-many relationships in a Django project, ensuring that the ORM correctly manages complex association scenarios and that future changes do not break expected behavior.
